campfire_events.prompt: Do you play, refuse, or set strict boundaries?

campfire_events.title: Weather Turns
campfire_events.description: Weather shifts hard during camp. The safest shelter is not obvious. The decision will affect rest and risk. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Where do you shelter?

campfire_events.title: Strange Gift
campfire_events.description: A small gift appears near your gear overnight: a charm, coin, shell, warm stone, or salt pouch. No footprints approach. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you keep it, test it, or leave it behind?

campfire_events.title: Argument at the Fire
campfire_events.description: A disagreement flares: route choices, watch order, or supplies. The camp mood hinges on how you handle it. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: How do you resolve it?

campfire_events.title: Ward Circle Opportunity
campfire_events.description: You find a natural circle that could serve as a ward site, but using it might draw attention. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you use it, disrupt it, or camp elsewhere?

campfire_events.title: Fire Won't Catch (11)
campfire_events.description: Dry kindling refuses to ignite. Sparks die midair, as if the night itself is smothering flame. A faint sign of Temple of Pelagos lingers in the air. An offering lies close: pearler bead.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you move camp, perform a ward/ritual, or go without a fire?

campfire_events.title: Distant Signals (12)
campfire_events.description: Distant signals repeat with deliberate spacing, like a practiced code. Someone is coordinating out there. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you hide, scout, or prepare defenses?

campfire_events.title: Night Visitor (13)
campfire_events.description: Selene Pelagosworn appears at the edge of firelight asking to share warmth under Temple of Pelagos. They offer a rumor or trade. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you invite them in, keep distance, or send them away?

campfire_events.title: Missing Item Morning (14)
campfire_events.description: At dawn, something is missing from camp. Tracks are unclear, as if the thief planned carefully. The air carries reef bays, sea-glass beaches, mangrove inlets, coral arches, pirate whispers.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you track, set a trap tonight, or accept the loss and move?

campfire_events.title: Shared Dream (15)
campfire_events.description: Multiple people share a similar dream: the marks of Clan Rowthron and Temple of Pelagos, plus a direction or warning tied to tomorrow's route. An offering lies close: kelp cord.
campfire_events.prompt: Do you follow the dream's guidance, ignore it, or verify with a scout?
